participant_1.background:
My dad was a cop and my wife just left me
i drive a fast sports car.
I like to read to my baby, so there's always a book in her nursery.
Since my new job is physically demanding, I try to go for a walk every day.
I cherish my Kesha concert ticket stub.

participant_2.background:
My bright blue eyes are a contrast to my clumsy nature.
my favorite food to harvest is carrots.
i am always looking for wildlife when i am outside.
i am really excited to see how game of thrones ends.
my parents were like this as well.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Hi there! I'm good thanks, how are you?
I am doing well, thanks! My dad was a cop too. I miss him a lot.
I'm sorry to hear that. Mine are alive and well. I love them a lot.
I'm glad to hear that! Do you have any brothers or sisters?
I have a younger brother. He's clumsy too. I'm the opposite. I'm quite graceful.
I have a younger sister who's clumsy too. We laugh about it all the time.
I'm sure you do! What do you do for a living?
I'm a stay-at-home mom right now. I love it!
That's amazing! I'm a teacher. I love it too!
That's great! I love reading to my daughter.
I love harvesting carrots in my garden. It's so relaxing.
I'm always looking for wildlife when I'm outside. I love nature.
Me too! I can't wait to see how Game of Thrones ends. It's going to be so good!
Me too! I'm so excited for it!
It's going to be so sad to see it end.
I know! I'm going to miss it!
Me too! But it's been a great ride.
It has! Thanks for chatting with me today! It's been nice to meet you.
It's been nice to meet you too! Have a great day!
You too! Bye!
